column1: Little Goat Diner////The adjacent bakery (Little Goat Bread) makes gluten free muffins and are about to start baking gluten free bread!!!!  I was sooooo excited that I couldn't shut up talking about how gluten free is awesome
column3: the girl behind the register must've thought i was nutzo.  :) Anyways
column4: the staff is amazing.  We met the manager of the restaurant
column7: would love to chat with him again about all the adventures of the Boka Group and Stephanie.  The staff in general are very very nice and super helpful in advising on the menu because it's sort of large and overwhelming.
